metadata.description:
"Tope" is a song that represents "No more" and an "awakening" in the life of someone who has been attacked from the negative opinions and actions of others. This song has been produced by Colombo and the artwork by Fernando Santana. The sound is characterized by its exploration of R&B and some vocal details that served as the basis for the final composition of the song.

In this next step of the description I am happy to tell those people who have collected "Insert" or/and will collect "Tope" that after the end of this drop, an NFT of the video of this song will be dropped in their Wallets. The recording of this video was very important since it was born from a homemade and amateur idea that made the world know me as an artist, that is, doing everything at home from the composition of the song to the publication of the video on social networks.

Finally, the golden egg of this release represents a very important stage in my life, of which the creation of "Tope" was part, I hope that the collector who wins it will be able to connect a little more with my story. Thank you very much for being here and for allowing me to show you my art.

lyrics.text:
Voy a ser sincera
no me he tenido amor
me cuesta aceptarme 
Me siento lo peor
pero algo garantiza que aún siendo perfecta
tu me sigas odiando
Por cuestiones incorrectas
No piensas que me dañan tus palabras
No piensas que mis sentimientos hablan
te vale si todas tus lanzas clavan
te vale si alguna llega a mi cara

Mi mala condición
se volvió tu pasión 
Y ahora al parecer 
también tu profesión

Yo te puedo decir
Mi cuerpo se cansó
de recibir torturas
sin ninguna razón
Que mierda tan absurda
pedir tu aprobación
No le suma a mi vida 
nada que sea valor
Me pones en paredes
que dañan mi razón 
y dañan mi corazón

Quiero ver mi tiempo
aprovecharlo al tempo
Quiero reconocerme 
y también quererme

No lo permites, bajas mis ganas y cortas alas
Me humillas, dices que es broma no pasa nada
Pero eso por lo que ríes sin preocuparte
Es la razón por la que logro agobiarme

Y no quiero ya preocuparme por todo eso
No debes ser relevante en mi sucesos
no deben ser importantes tus opiniones
No debo ser la variantes de tus errores
Y no quiero serlo 
y no debo serlo 
Y no lo seré

metadata.name: Tope #1
metadata.title: Tope
